summary: This is a criminal history record inquiry from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services for NYSID number 08544751K, conducted on October 6, 2021. The document contains standard criminal history summary information with warnings about its use and limitations.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency issuing the criminal history record.

events.title: Criminal History Inquiry
events.description: A criminal history record inquiry was conducted for NYSID number 08544751K by the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.

events.title: Sentencing Policy Change
events.description: Reference to sentencing policy where sentences for multiple charges within a docket are considered concurrent unless specified as consecutive, for sentences on or after June 1, 1981.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: This document is a criminal history record from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.
The inquiry was conducted on October 6, 2021 for NYSID number 08544751K.
The record includes a warning that identification is not based on fingerprint comparison.
The document contains standard legal warnings about prohibited release of information under federal law.
No specific criminal history, job/license, wanted, or missing person information is associated with this particular inquiry.
